definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: front, east, aforetime;—abs.´[[ק]]: De 33:27 +, [[קֶָקֶם]] Ju Jdg 8:10 +; cstr. [[קֶדֶם]] Pr 8:22; once pl. cstr. [[קַדְמֵי]] v:Pr 8:23;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: front, ´[[מִקּ]]: Is 9:11 from the front (i.e. East), in front (opp.[[מֵאָחוֹר]]), ´[[אָחוֹר וׇק]]: Ps 139:5 behind and before; [[אֶהֳלֽח]] ´[[ק]]: Job 23:8 I go forward (opp.[[אָחוֹר]])

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: East: ´[[הַר־הַקּ]]: Ge 10:30 (J) mount of the East; ´[[בְּנֵי־ק]]: = dwellers in the E., tribes E. or NE. of Canaan Ge 29:1 (E), Ju Jdg 6:3, Jdg 6:33, Jdg 7:12, Jdg 8:10, 1Ki 5:10, Is 11:14, Je 49:28, Ez Eze 25:4, Eze 25:10, Job 1:3; ´[[הַרְרֵי ק]]: Nu 23:7, v. Di Sachau: Reise (1883), 159 ff.165 ff. Dr in Hast.:PETHOS; ´[[אֶרֶץ ק]]: Ge 25:6 (J); [[מָֽלְאוּ מִקֶּדֶם]] Is 2:6 they are full from the E. (ins. prob.[[קֶסֶם]], [[מִקְסָם]], or < [[קׂסְמִים]] before ´[[מִקּ]]:, cf. Lo De Du Che:Hpt Di-Kit); elsewh. ´[[מִקּ]]: =eastward: (I) in the E. Ge 2:8 (2) on the E. (side) Ge 12:8 (J) Zec 14:4; [[לְ]] ´[[מִקּ]]: on the E. of  Ge 3:24 (J), Ge 12:8 (J), Nu 34:1l (P), Jos 7:2 (JE), Jdg 8:11, Ez Eze 11:23= Jon 4:5; (3) eastward, c.vb. of motion Ge 11:2, Ge 13:11 (both J).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[כִּימֵי ק]]: Ps 44:2 in ancient days; cf. ´[[מִימֵי ק]]: from of old  Is 23:7, Mic 7:20, La 1:7, La 2:17, Is 37:26 = ´[[לְמִימֵי ק]]: ) 2Ki 19:25 (v. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[מִקּ]]: from of old Mic 5:1, Is 45:21, Is 46:10, Hb Hab 1:12, Ne 12:46, Ps 74:12, Ps 77:12; ´[[מִנִּיק]]: Ps 78:2 springing out of, derived from, ancient times (cf.Dr); ´[[יׇמִים מִקּ]]: Ps 77:6, 143:5 days from of old.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: ´[[ק]]: alone, as adv. anciently, of old Ps 74:2, Ps 119:152; ´[[כְּק]]: Je 30:20, La 5:21; ´[[ישֵׁב ק]]: Ps 55:20 he that sitteth (enthroned from) of old.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: beginning, [[מִקַּדְמֵי־אָָרֶץ]] Pr 8:23 from the beginnings of the earth; [[מִפְעָלָיו]] ´[[ק]]: Pr 8:22 the beginning of his works (‖[[רֵאִשִׁית ]]).
